attributes.action: Introduce Licencsing knowledge awareness to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an Off-Licence employee i am getting more and more frustrated with the number of adults buying alcohol for minors. This can be their sibling / offspring friends etc. 
Basically i have now had a few problems with legal drinkers entering the shop to buy alcohol for minors who are with them at the time.
They even will ask them out loud what they want. Often these minros are not even close to 18.

Many people just do not understand that they cannot buy alcohol for a minor. They thinks it legal to buy them alcopops etc.

They also dont understand they are putting mey and many others livelyhoods at risk by doing this.

Maybe its about time we got awareness campaigns for this just like drink driving/drugs/safe sex etc especially as we are now topping the charts as the highest underage drinkers in europe.
